direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting between ISSN and EAN-13 formats, but in opposite directions.
The convertToEAN13 method relies on the validate method to ensure the input ISSN code is valid before conversion.
The extractFromEAN13 method relies on the validateEan method to ensure the input EAN-13 code is valid before extraction.
Both methods validate input codes, but isValid is more general and does not return the transformed code.
Both convertToEAN13 and extractFromEAN13 methods use the calculate method from EAN13CheckDigit and ISSNCheckDigit to compute check digits.
